SafeCoin is Safe, Secure, Anonymous

Safe nodes will make the SafeCoin network even More secure with much of the technology already in our blockchain

Instructions to Set Up Safe Nodes Coming

Why SafeCoin?

A decentralized cryptocurrency which is Safe, Secure, and Anonymous.

Has its own blockchain, and is used for Transactions, Communications, and Publishing.

Designed for long-term operation:

  • 36 million SafeCoin cap - small premine, no ICO
  • Mining reward stay with miners
  • No fees, taxes, or anything…miners get their block reward
  • Strong Team & Representation by all as a Powerful Community Coin
  • Wallets and communication clients for International Users, with TOR integration
  • Marketing Globalization - Tailored approach to different markets
  • Safe Nodes provide a resilient, distributed network, leveraging Komodo’s Notary Node technology

Why Secure Nodes are Important

Host a safe node, earn mining rewards and become part of SafeCoin!

Components of Safe Nodes are in our codebase now (notary nodes), from our fork of Komodo’s Notary Nodes, and will be implmented shortly after some modification an enhancemeent

Safenodes and dPOW will give SafeCoin the strength of bitcoin’s network through and are just one more layer of protection this blockchain offers.

Requirements

1

xx $SAFE

in transparent address per node

2

Tor Node?

from a known Certificate Authority

3

Computational Challenge

Run the node on a server with enough processor and memory so that it can meet a computational challenge

4

SafeCoin Blockchain

Maintain a full copy of the SafeCoin Blockchain

5

85%+ Uptime?

Keep the node up and running at least 85% of the time
